DataElement.preferredName: Tobacco Local Tobacco Control Public Policy Assessment Text
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality._The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties._The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another._Not private; open to or concerning the people as a whole._A plan of action adopted by an individual or social group._a free text field to specify information on the evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease

Concepts.definition: Of or belonging to a restricted area or locality.

The dried cured leaves of the tobacco plant, Nicotiana tabacum, used for smoking, chewing, or snuff.  Tobacco contains nicotine, a stimulant, and other biologically active ingredients having carcinogenic properties.
The act of directing or determining; regulation or maintenance of a function or action; a relation of constraint of one entity (thing or person or group) by another.
Not private; open to or concerning the people as a whole.
A plan of action adopted by an individual or social group.
